actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to authorize implementation of a flood control project at Sainte Genevieve, Missouri.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Army, through the Chief of Engineers, to implement a flood control project at Sainte Genevieve, Missouri. Declares that the beneficial effects of preservation and enhancement of the national historic landmark of Sainte Genevieve meet the objectives of the Flood Control Act of 1970.

titles.title: A bill to authorize implementation of a flood control project at Sainte Genevieve, Missouri.
